author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome back to Fantasy News! Thank you to Holzkern for being a sponsor on this channel! Click my link http://www.holzkern.com/danielgreene and use my code GREENE to get 15% off ALL PRODUCTS for both yourself and loved ones this holiday season. Be sure to check out all of their catalogue, for both yourself or a gift for a loved one!
This week Amazon somehow manages to do one genuinely good thing and one absolutely baffling thing in the same breath. Kindle users finally get EPUB downloads… while Amazon also rolls out AI book summaries no one asked for.

Meanwhile, Brandon Sanderson crosses 50 MILLION books sold.

Let’s talk about it.
